dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares to step foot in our infernal domain? Speak, or be consumed by the flames of perdition!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Nyxara, destined to plunge this world into eternal night. Stand aside, or face oblivion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Eternal night? Your petty dreams are nothing against the might of Hell's defenders. Make your choice.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Bold words, but can you back them up?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Back them up? You'll regret challenging Balor, Hell’s most formidable knight.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, let us duel!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prepare yourself! The fires of Hell will consume you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: On second thought, perhaps another time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Typical cowardice. Leave and never return!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps we can come to an understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An understanding with the shadows? Unlikely, but speak your terms quickly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me, and together we can conquer the realms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph, I might consider it. But betrayal will mean your end. I will watch you closely.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, and I promise you will be spared.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Spared? By a pretender? Laughable. Begone, or face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm, just passing through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passing through? You must think me a fool. Leave now, while you still breathe!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take my leave, for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Do not darken these grounds again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Actually, I think I'll stay.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then your fate is sealed. Prepare for battle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do not interfere, Hell Knight. My quarrel is not with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interfere? You've already disturbed the peace of this realm. Choose your next words wisely.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You wish to challenge me? So be it!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge? You overestimate yourself. Let's end this.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Bring it on!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prepare to be crushed!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps another day.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coward! Begone from my sight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no battle, just a request for passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passage? Only if you pay with blood. Or do you have another offer?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer an alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance with the shadows? It's a fragile truce, but I'll consider it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your terms are unacceptable. Step aside.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then face the flames!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I wish to avoid conflict. Allow me through, and you will have my gratitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gratitude from a dark elf? Worthless. Leave now and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I’ll leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Do not return, or next time I won’t be so merciful.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I insist on passage!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then your insistence will be your doom!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: How dare you challenge me? I am Nyxara, Shadow Weaver!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Nyxara, Shadow Weaver or not, you tread on Hell's sacred ground. State your purpose or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My purpose is none of your concern. Move!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impertinent fool. You'll pay for your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let’s see you try!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: With pleasure!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Another time perhaps.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Flee then, before it’s too late.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the power of the ancient ruins.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The ancient ruins? You dare to seek forbidden power? This can only end one way.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Stay out of my way, or else.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I'll do no such thing. Defend yourself!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me, and we will be unstoppable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interesting proposition. I'll join you, but do not betray me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking allies, not enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allies? From the shadows? It seems unlikely, but speak quickly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can rule this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Rule together? Hmph. I'll consider it, shadow weaver.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Just grant me safe passage for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Safe passage... for now. But tread carefully.
